column5: I'm looking to get the sun pad from my boat repaired/recovered. Can anyone recommend anything in the Durham area?
Port Perry Auto Glass and Trim.  They do a lot of boat work and do a great job.  There is also a guy on hwy 35 near Fenlon Falls, and also a guy on hwy 48 north end of Balsam lake.
Thanks. I'll give Port Perry a call
